channel.title: mediawiki extension translate usability issues even for English wiki pages
channel.description:
> This page contains changes which are not marked for translation.
This doesn't mean much for readers here probably, but for new users that's just another bit of unnecessary mental burden which needs to be reduced for better usability.
That message can be quite easily be hidden.
> Translate this page
It's also not great to have this at the very top.
Can we move this somehow somewhere else to the footer or so?
//cc @Ego @fortasse

item.title: mediawiki extension translate usability issues even for English wiki pages

item.description:
Good day,

Sadly not as this message is hard wired into the source code: https://github.com/wikimedia/mediawiki-extensions-Translate/blob/7bef0ed3ec963baf391bece71f51c11afe0160a3/i18n/pagetranslation/en.json

We’d have to spent some time forking it…

Have a nice day,

Ego
